content.rendered:
Our Services

SKILLVIRE's

We at SKILLVIRE provide the best guidance in psychological research to Indian students.  This service is tailored to students who struggle to conduct independent research and require ongoing assistance while learning. You can complete your project on time and to the required standards if you work with our professional and experienced team. Whether it is a research proposal or a synopsis, a term paper or an assignment, a dissertation or a thesis, a research paper or a conference presentation, we help students in research planning, assist them in data analysis (qualitative or quantitative), and guide them in the documentation.

  • We believe in empowering students, so we help, guide, and assist (just like a real guide). 
  • We help in domain selection, research type selection, variable selection, sample design, topic formulation, and methodology formulation.
  • We provide access to the limited-access research papers and psychological tools, and we also help with the data analysis.
  • We guide authors in framing the introduction, rationale, research gaps, results, discussions, references, etc. for a publication-fit manuscript.

By getting in touch with us, you can get free basic advice on how to start or run a research project in psychology. To apply for any of our services, choose from the options below.

Qualitative Analysis

Read more about this service below

Qualitative Analysis

Price: 900 INR

Buy now
Solutions we provide

We can assist you in doing/ building these things out of your qualitative data -
  • Qualitative content analysis (inductive or deductive) of transcripts, audio, video, images, documents, etc.
  • Qualitative network maps.
  • Groundedness of codes.
  • Code co-occurrence data.
  • Intercoder agreement.
  • And much more...

Key takeaways

You would get -
  • Analysis output.
  • Results.

Quantitative Analysis

Read more about this service below

Quantitative Analysis

Price: 700 INR

Buy now
Solutions we provide

We can assist you in doing/ building/ calculating these things out of your quantitative data -
  • Data scoring.
  • Frequency distribution table.
  • Graphs or charts.
  • Descriptive statistics (mean, median, mode, average deviation, standard deviation, variance, quartile deviation, standard error of mean, skewness, kurtosis).
  • Dealing with outliers.
  • Normality testing.
  • Assumptions testing.
  • 2 independent or paired sample tests (parametric or non parametric).
  • K independent or paired sample tests (parametric or non parametric).
  • Correlation (parametric or non parametric).
  • Regression (simple linear, multiple linear, multivariate linear).
  • Internal consistency.
  • And much more...

Key takeaways

You would get -
  • Scored or treated data.
  • Analysis output file.
  • Results.

Review of Literature

Read more about this service below

Review of Literature

Price: 1500 INR

Buy now
Solutions we provide

We can guide you in -
  • Topic selection.
  • Methodological framing.
  • Finding literature.
  • Tabulations.
  • Documentation.
  • Referencing.
  • And much more...

Key takeaways

You would get -
  • Credible databases for search (researches, thesis, and e-books)
  • Full access of almost all research papers and books.
  • Assistance in basic grammar and plagiarism checking.
  • Dedicated personal guidance at every stage.

Research Proposal

Read more about this service below

Research Proposal

Price: 3000 INR

Buy now
Solutions we provide

We can guide you in -
  • Topic selection.
  • Finding research gaps and rationale.
  • Methodological framing (qualitative or quantitative or mixed).
  • Finding literature.
  • Tabulations.
  • Finding tools.
  • Framing proposed outcomes.
  • Documentation.
  • Referencing.
  • And much more...

Key takeaways

You would get -
  • Credible databases for search (researches, thesis, and e-books)
  • Full access of almost all research papers and books.
  • Accessibility of psychological tools (free to use for research purpose only)
  • Assistance in basic grammar and plagiarism checking.
  • Dedicated personal guidance at every stage.

Full Research Guidance

Read more about this service below

Full Research Guidance

Price: 3800 INR

Buy now
Solutions we provide

We can guide/ assist you in -
  • Topic selection.
  • Finding research gaps and rationale.
  • Finding literature.
  • Methodological framing (qualitative or quantitative).
  • Building ethical statements.
  • Sample design.
  • Finding tools.
  • Scoring.
  • Data treatment and assumptions testing.
  • Data analysis (qualitative or quantitative).
  • Tabulations.
  • Documentation.
  • Referencing.
  • And much more...

Key takeaways

You would get -
  • Credible databases for search (researches, thesis, and e-books).
  • Full access of almost all research papers and books.
  • Accessibility of psychological tools (free to use for research purpose only).
  • Results of the data analysis.
  • Assistance in basic grammar and plagiarism checking.
  • Dedicated personal guidance at every stage.

P. G. P. Service

Read more about this service below

P. G. P. Service

Price: 2500

Contact us
Solutions we provide

We can guide/ assist you in -
  • P: Paraphrasing.
  • G: Grammar correction.
  • P: Plagiarism reduction.

Key takeaways

You would get -
  • Complete paraphrased document.
  • Correct grammar.
  • Institutionally accepted plagiarism level (Turnitin equivalent).

Custom Service

Read more about this service below

Custom Service

Price: Negotiable

Contact us
For any more information, read our policies.
